DOC.brief_summary: The investigator seek increase medication adherence subject . The investigator send mailing customer insurance company , ask predict commit certain level behavior . The investigator measure whether increase medication adherence .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator seek increase medication adherence subject . The investigator send mailing customer insurance company , ask predict commit certain level behavior . The investigator measure whether increase medication adherence . The investigator send mailing subject per month , elicit response via mail , phone , web survey .
